PersonalStatement.text: Charles Butler, born on 1993-03-09, is a Male based in Gonzalezborough, Guam. He is Single and holds Singaporean nationality. Currently working at Vasquez-Kelley.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Dorsey-Jenkins from 2005 to 2016.
Senior Financial Analyst at Vasquez-Kelley, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from Thammasat University
Master's in Engineering from MIREA - Russian Technological University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys hiking.
